title: Im trying to use my Samsung 4si for a Hot Spot for my Acer Chromebook.
content:
They see each other but when I try to pair, I get a code, as soon as I Accept it, it says Failed to connect to Samsung-SGH-1537.
They both show up on each other and on the Chrome book, it shows the SGH-1537 Is paired.
I don't know if I am doing the right thing? Your help would be greatly appreciated! 
Thank you! 
Hope you have a GREAT week and weekend!
